strats.description: 3 fingers is only required for a single section in this song; you can replace it with a 2 finger strategy below.
strats.author: TheLetterP

strategies.title: Default
strategies.description: For this strategy you alternate between right and left hand for every note, using your right middle finger where necessary.
strategies.author: TheLetterP

strategies.title: Jacking
strategies.description: This strategy relies heavily on jacking many notes in a row. Right hand taps the notes on the right side, whilst left hand taps the notes in the middle and to the left. This strategy is also referred to by some as "The Picture".
strategies.author: TheLetterP

strategies.title: Default
strategies.description: This strategy hits the holds the intended way, by using two fingers and alternating them whilst swiping inwards.
strategies.author: TheLetterP

strategies.title: Multifinger Cheese
strategies.description: For this strategy you use four fingers to hit the holds, without the need to move them. This strategy is a lot simpler to execute compared to only using two fingers.
strategies.author: TheLetterP
